app.title: CC Switch
app.description: Claude Code & Codex Provider Switching Tool

jsonEditor.mustBeObject: Configuration must be a JSON object, not an array or other type

claudeConfig.commonConfigHint: This snippet will be merged into settings.json when 'Write Common Config' is checked

provider.noProvidersDescription: Click the "Add Provider" button in the top right to configure your first API provider
provider.editProviderHint: Configuration will be applied to the current provider immediately after update.
provider.addProviderHint: Fill in the information to quickly switch providers in the list.
provider.name: Provider Name
provider.configJsonHint: Please fill in complete Claude Code configuration
provider.editCommonConfigHint: Common config snippet will be merged into all providers that enable it
provider.usageSaveFailed: Failed to save usage query configuration

gemini.oauthHint: Google official uses OAuth personal authentication, no need to fill in API Key. The browser will automatically open for login on first use.

notifications.switchSuccess: Switch successful! Please restart {{appName}} terminal to take effect
notifications.autoImported: Default provider created from existing configuration

confirm.deleteProviderMessage: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.languageHint: Preview interface language immediately after switching, takes effect permanently after saving.
settings.themeHint: Choose the appearance theme for the app, takes effect immediately.
settings.importExportHint: Import or export CC Switch configuration for backup or migration.
settings.syncLiveFailed: Imported, but failed to sync to the current provider. Please reselect the provider manually.
settings.importPartialSuccess: Config imported, but failed to sync to the current provider.
settings.importPartialHint: Please manually reselect the provider to refresh the live configuration.
settings.configCorrupted: Config file may be corrupted or invalid
settings.autoReload: Data will refresh automatically in 2 seconds...
settings.windowBehaviorHint: Configure window minimize and Claude plugin integration policies.
settings.minimizeToTrayDescription: When checked, clicking the close button will hide to system tray, otherwise the app will exit directly.
settings.enableClaudePluginIntegrationDescription: When enabled, the VS Code Claude Code extension provider will switch with this app
settings.configDirectoryDescription: When using Claude Code or Codex in environments like WSL, you can manually specify the configuration directory to the one in WSL to keep provider data consistent with the main environment.
settings.appConfigDirDescription: Customize the storage location for CC Switch configuration (point to cloud sync folder to enable config sync)
settings.claudeConfigDirDescription: Override Claude configuration directory (settings.json) and keep claude.json (MCP) alongside it.
settings.resetDefault: Reset to default directory (takes effect after saving)
settings.aboutHint: View version information and update status.
settings.portableMode: Portable mode: updates require manual download.
settings.updateFailed: Update installation failed, attempted to open download page.
settings.checkUpdateFailed: Failed to check for updates, please try again later.
settings.viewReleaseNotes: View release notes for this version
settings.restartRequiredMessage: Modifying the CC Switch configuration directory requires restarting the application to take effect. Restart now?
settings.restartFailed: Application restart failed, please manually close and reopen.
settings.devModeRestartHint: Dev Mode: Automatic restart not supported, please manually restart the application.
